attributes.action: That Nadine Dories' pay as an MP should be docked
attributes.additional_details: Nadine Dories intends to join the reality TV programme "I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out of Here" whilst Parliament is sitting, thus depriving her constituents of representation. Given that she has walked away from her job without notice, the least her constituents should expect is that she is not paid for her time when she is not representing them.
